lines.text: Where in the cosmos did that space jockey get his license?
The worst that could happen is we'll spend two thousand years in suspended animation. Well... still beats a desk job.
No one can stop me now, Princely Hero. Come on fight, what can you do against me?
A single commando raid is our only chance of rescuing Barbara and recovering the capotron.
If you think theres a ray of hope, go. But not on your own.

[Golob starts to move, two guards attempt to stop him]
Hey!

[speaks with difficulty]
Golob go. Bar-bra... my friend.

[during space battle]
Lets go in with hyper galactic stellar-ray. Those six idiots couldn't blow up an old trashcan!
